subject: Re: Editing EVP
author: LC Duplatt
full_text:
Stefan, yes, I agree.  

I should clarify.  Some skeptics/critics never intend to 
believe...their mind is made up.  That's who I avoid.  Now a skeptic or 
critic who is at least open to the possibility of communication from 
the other side, I will point them in a direction to seek answers within 
for themselves.  :)

LC

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Stefan Bion <yahoogroups@...> wrote:
>
> Hi LC,
> 
> > There will always be skeptics and critics, but one thing seems
> > certain: everyone has their own time when they become open to the 
> > possibility of the paranormal/spiritual existing.  I just choose to 
> > share with those whose time has come.  :)
> 
> I wouldn't see an skeptical/critical attitude as something negative.
> Some people just aren't "believers", their intellect wants to be
> satisfied, too. :)
> 
> So being skeptical/critical doesn't necessarily mean not being a
> "seeker".
> 
> Stefan
>
